hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export P4CLIENT=kw_il_integration-2055642192 export P4PORT=perforce.spirentcom.com:1666 export P4USER=scmbuild
sudo rm -rf $WORKSPACE/* p4 -s sync -f //kw_il_integration-2055642192/...

export avail=`df -h | grep \/dev\/sda1 | sed 's/\(.*\)G\(.*\)G\(.*\)[G|M].*/\3/g' | sed 's/\ //g' | cut -d . -f 1` export cutoff_limit=10 # clear ccache is disk space is too low if [[ $avail -ge $cutoff_limit ]]; then echo "Available disk space is $avail and is greater than $cutoff_limit, ccache not clear"; else echo "Cut-off limit for disk space is $cutoff_limit and is greater than available disk space of $avail, clearing ccache"; ccache -C export avail=`df -h | grep \/dev\/sda1 | sed 's/\(.*\)G\(.*\)G\(.*\)G.*/\3/g'` echo "Available disk space after ccache cleared is now $avail" fi

export PATH=/usr/bin:/opt/klocwork/bin:"$PATH" export PYTHONPATH=/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages
echo "Copying ~/bin/klockwork_build.sh to build directory ..." cp ~/bin/klocwork_build.sh . kwinject --version echo "Executing klockwork build script ..." kwinject -T integration_kw.trace ./klocwork_build.sh
echo "Executing kwinject -t integration_kw.trace -o integration_kw.out ..." kwinject -t integration_kw.trace -o integration_kw.out
# cd $WORKSPACE/framework/il/kernel/linux-2.4.20_mvl31/include/linux # echo "#define KERNEL_VERSION(a,b,c) (((a) << 16) + ((b) << 8) + (c))" > version.h
# '/bin/sh' '-c' 'echo \#define LINUX_COMPILER \"`ppc_405-gcc -D__KERNEL__ -I/home/scmbuild/TestCenter/integration/framework/il/kernel/linux-2.4.20_mvl31/include -I/home/scmbuild/TestCenter/integration/framework/il/kernel/linux-2.4.20_mvl31/../include -Wall -Wstrict-prototypes -Wno-trigraphs -O2 -fno-strict-aliasing -fno-common -fomit-frame-pointer -I/home/scmbuild/TestCenter/integration/framework/il/kernel/linux-2.4.20_mvl31/arch/ppc -fsigned-char -msoft-float -pipe -ffixed-r2 -Wno-uninitialized -mmultiple -mstring -Wa,-m405 -v 2>&1 | tail -1`\" > compile.h'
cd $WORKSPACE cd $WORKSPACE/framework/il/kernel/linux-2.4.20_mvl31; cd $WORKSPACE/framework/il/kernel/linux-2.4.20_mvl31;rm -f .hhl_* cd $WORKSPACE/framework/il/kernel/linux-2.4.20_mvl31;cp -f ../config/ppc/.hhl_* . cd $WORKSPACE/framework/il/kernel/linux-2.4.20_mvl31;make ARCH=ppc chassis_c2_config rm -f .config arch/ppc/defconfig cp -f arch/ppc/configs/chassis_c2_defconfig arch/ppc/defconfig make oldconfig
cd $WORKSPACE/framework/il/kernel/linux-2.4.20_mvl31/include ln -s asm-ppc asm
cd $WORKSPACE echo "Executing kwbuildproject -f -o kwtables integration_kw.out --project integration_x86 ..." kwbuildproject --url http://klocwork.cal.ci.spirentcom.com:8090/integration_x86_baseline -f -o kwtables integration_kw.out --project integration_x86 || true
TODAY=$(date +"%Y-%m-%d") echo "Upload new Klocwork analysis result to the baseline project ..." echo "Executing kwadmin --url http://klocwork.cal.ci.spirentcom.com:8090 load integration_x86_baseline ./kwtables --name integration_$TODAY ..."; kwadmin --url http://klocwork.cal.ci.spirentcom.com:8090 load integration_x86_baseline ./kwtables --name integration_$TODAY
